item.description:
The book club met last night and it was a wonderful group of about 10 people.  We decided to make it bi-monthly thing, meaning we will read one book a month spread out over two meetings. So on July 25, we will continue our discussion of Radical Acceptance.

Each month, another member will take the lead picking a book and facilitating discussion.  For August, Don proposed the book the Mindfulness Revolution, so those who want to join in the August meetings should start finding a copy.

This leaves other weeks open for other kinds of meetings--movie nights, dharma talks, walks, etc.  Start posting ideas!
item.why: The book club met last night and decided to make it bi-monthly thing. We will read one book a month, spread out over two meetings. So on the 25th, we will continue our discussion of Radical Acceptance.
item.name: Book club?
